TITLE_SEO: Jeferson Barrero @jeffercbs - Frontend, JavaScript, React, CSS, Performance
DESCRIPTION_SEO: Software Enginer | Young web developer | Technology enthusiast | @platzi student | content creator | occasional writer.
ABOUT_DESC:
My name is Jeferson Barrero, but my friends call me Jef. My journey into programming began at the age of 14, self-taught and inspired by figures like Freddy Vegas while exploring the web. This early immersion into the fascinating world of programming was my first window into digital creativity.

As a student at PLATZI and participant in the project 'MisiónTIC2022', backed by the Colombian government and MINTIC, I have gained solid knowledge in programming and web development. Actively participating in personal and collaborative projects with clients has been crucial to strengthening my skills, not only as a programmer but also in creating unique applications.

Complementing this journey with additional virtual courses from SENA and currently studying 3D modeling for the industry, I aspire to excel in the field of web development and programming. My vision includes not only personal growth but also actively contributing to the community. As an active collaborator on GitHub, I participate in projects aimed at promoting free and open programming education.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Freelance Web Developer
EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: As an independent web developer, I specialize in crafting unique applications for brands and businesses, spanning a full spectrum of needs, from static websites to online stores. My focus is on delivering innovative and functional technological solutions tailored to the specific goals and requirements of each client.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: MisionTIC2022
EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION:
My participation in Misión TIC 2022, since its pilot phase in August 2020, was characterized by comprehensive training in web projects with a specific focus on Node.js. Actively collaborating with young individuals from across the country on joint projects not only expanded my technical skills but also provided a valuable experience of nationwide teamwork.

Complementary activities, such as professional talks and the visit to the Entrepreneurs' Park, added significant value to my education. The talks offered enriching perspectives and practical advice, while the park visit provided a tangible insight into the technological needs of the country. These complementary elements enhanced my overall understanding and offered a deeper vision of the practical application of technology in the national context.

EDUCATION.TITLE: PLATZI
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nihil aut corrupti temporibus inventore facere atque unde ratione, nisi cum repellat!

ITEMS.TITLE: Frontend Developer Course
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: I delved into the basics of HTML and CSS, exploring its structure, elements, and CSS properties. I acquired advanced skills in layout and responsive design.

ITEMS.TITLE: Fundamentals of Software Engineering
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: I explored the basics of electronics, deepened my knowledge of various operating systems and understood the networks that support the operation of the Internet.

ITEMS.TITLE: Git and GitHub Professional Course
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: I acquired essential knowledge ranging from fundamental concepts to advanced project management. I developed the ability to clone repositories and efficiently manage my projects, both locally and on collaborative platforms such as GitHub.

ITEMS.TITLE: Python Challenge
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: I followed an optimized path to strengthen my foundation in Python programming, focusing especially on backend development.

SERVICES_MSG: Discover how we can together create the perfect website for your brand or company. Turn your vision into reality today!
SERVICES_TOOLS_DESC: Integrate the latest in technology to your next project
ONE_PLAN_DESC: A plan for entrepreneurs, brands, or small businesses looking to establish a compelling online presence. With our streamlined approach, we create elegant and functional static websites that showcase the identity of your brand.
TWO_PLAN_DESC: Un plan diseñado para empresas en crecimiento, tiendas online y sitios web de mayor envergadura que requieren funcionalidades avanzadas. Con nuestro enfoque integral, creamos sitios web dinámicos, con backend y base de datos, para llevar tu presencia online al siguiente nivel.
TWO_PLAN_FEACTURES: Una base de datos (Postgres o sqlite)
